recommendations.title: Technical Architecture Design
recommendations.reason: High complexity due to multiple architectural concerns, security requirements, and compliance needs
recommendations.expansionPrompt: Break down the technical architecture design into more granular components including: 1) Detailed system component design with microservices architecture, 2) Database optimization and indexing strategies, 3) API versioning and documentation standards, 4) Security compliance mapping (GDPR/HIPAA), 5) Performance and scalability planning, 6) Integration architecture with third-party services

recommendations.title: Document Upload & Storage System
recommendations.reason: Critical system with complex file processing, OCR integration, and cloud storage requirements
recommendations.expansionPrompt: Expand document upload system to include: 1) File validation and virus scanning, 2) OCR engine selection and integration, 3) File compression and optimization, 4) Cloud storage with multiple providers, 5) File processing queue management, 6) Metadata extraction and indexing, 7) Upload progress and error handling

recommendations.title: Document Organization & Categorization
recommendations.reason: AI-powered system requiring machine learning integration and complex categorization logic
recommendations.expansionPrompt: Break down AI categorization system into: 1) Machine learning model selection and training, 2) Document preprocessing and feature extraction, 3) Category prediction algorithms, 4) Tag generation and relevance scoring, 5) User feedback and model improvement, 6) Custom category training and management

recommendations.title: Search & Retrieval Engine
recommendations.reason: Complex search system requiring integration with search engines and performance optimization
recommendations.expansionPrompt: Expand search engine to include: 1) Search engine selection and configuration (Elasticsearch/PostgreSQL), 2) Search algorithm implementation and ranking, 3) Faceted search and filtering, 4) Search result caching and optimization, 5) Search analytics and user behavior tracking, 6) Advanced search features (fuzzy search, synonyms)

recommendations.title: Web Frontend Development
recommendations.reason: Large frontend application with multiple complex interfaces and state management
recommendations.expansionPrompt: Break down frontend development into: 1) Project setup and build configuration, 2) Component library and design system, 3) State management and data flow, 4) Document viewer and editor components, 5) Search interface and filters, 6) User management and settings, 7) Responsive design and accessibility, 8) Performance optimization and lazy loading

recommendations.title: Security & Backup Systems
recommendations.reason: Critical security system requiring encryption, compliance, and disaster recovery
recommendations.expansionPrompt: Expand security system to include: 1) Encryption key management and rotation, 2) Access control and role-based permissions, 3) Audit logging and compliance reporting, 4) Backup strategies and disaster recovery, 5) Security monitoring and threat detection, 6) Penetration testing and vulnerability assessment, 7) Compliance validation (GDPR/HIPAA)

tasksWithGoodSubtasks.title: Backend Development - Core Infrastructure
tasksWithGoodSubtasks.reason: Well-balanced subtasks covering all major backend concerns

tasksWithGoodSubtasks.title: Mobile Application Development
tasksWithGoodSubtasks.reason: Good coverage of mobile development phases
